description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shoot paint balls at your opponent and hit the most splashes or collect max bonus points to win. 5 independent levels including level customization for personalizing challenges. May the best player win!
description.short: Shoot paint balls at your opponent and hit the most splashes or collect max bonus points to win. 5 independent levels including level customization for personalizing challenges. May the best player win!
